thread.title: Shale investors still waiting for payoff

title: Shale investors still waiting for payoff
text:
Shale investors still waiting for payoff 2:00am IST - 01:05 
U.S. oil production has topped 10 million barrels per day, but many investors in the companies driving the shale oil revolution are still waiting for their payday. Aleksandra Michalska reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
